name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Henry WATTS, Appellee

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
LARSEN, J., files a dissenting opinion.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Henry WATTS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Order of the Superior Court 319 Pa.Super. 179, 465 A.2d 1288, is affirmed.
LARSEN, J., files a dissenting opinion.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

opinions.text:
LARSEN, Justice,
dissenting.
I dissent based upon my dissenting opinion in Commonwealth v. Starr, 486 Pa. 530, 406 A.2d 1017 (1979), and would therefore reverse the order of the Superior Court.
opinions.author: LARSEN, Justice,

attorneys: Michael J. Kane, Dist. Atty., Stephen B. Harris, Doylestown, for appellant.
Robert J. Kupits, Doylestown, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
489 A.2d 747
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Henry WATTS, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 7, 1984.
Decided April 3, 1985.
Michael J. Kane, Dist. Atty., Stephen B. Harris, Doylestown, for appellant.
Robert J. Kupits, Doylestown, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
